#include <bits/stdc++.h> 
using namespace std; 
int solve(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int x3, int y3)
{
        return (x1*(y2-y3) + x2*(y3-y1) + x3*(y1-y2))/2;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
 
    cin >> t;
    int cs = 0;
    while(t--) {
        cs++;
        int x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3, x4, y4;
        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2 >> x3 >> y3 >> x4 >> y4;
 
        int area = solve(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3);
        int area1 = solve(x3, y3, x4, y4, x1, y1);
        area += area1;
        if(area < 0) area = -area;
        int v1 = 0;
        v1 += __gcd(abs(x2-x1), abs(y2-y1));
        v1 += __gcd(abs(x3-x2), abs(y3-y2));
        v1 += __gcd(abs(x4-x3), abs(y4-y3));
        v1 += __gcd(abs(x1-x4), abs(y1-y4));
       // cout<<v1<<endl;
 
        cout << "Case " << cs << ": " << (area+1) - v1/2 + v1<< endl;
 
    }
}
